bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Investigating and Analyzing Shielded Power Cable Failures on Systems Rated 5 kV Through 46 kV
IEEE Draft Guide for Investigating and Analyzing Shielded Power Cable Failures on Systems Rated 5 kV Through 46 kV
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1511.1/D3.0, Dec 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide covers specific methods of failure mode classifications and analysis for shielded power cables rated 5 kV through 46 kV.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
